title: Fabiana D'Addario Articles | Similarweb
description: Looking for articles written by Fabiana D'Addario? Check out all of Fabiana D'Addario's insightful articles on the Similarweb blog, enter now!
content: HomeBlogFabiana D'Addario Fabiana D'Addario Fabiana D’Addario is a Senior Client Success Analyst at Similarweb and has spent the past four years working with buy-side, sell-side, and Fortune 500 companies. She is passionate about using alternative data to improve and inform investment decisions as well as optimizing digital performance for growth. Fabiana graduated from the University of Southern California with a bachelor’s degree in international relations global marketing with a minor in advertising. Before Similarweb, she began her career in the tech space in marketing and advertising roles at Steelhouse and Impact. In her spare time, you will find Fabiana baking, hitting the newest Omakase spot, or enjoying a concert.
